summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2373 for the improvement of Olive Street, from Ninth Avenue to Melrose Avenue; Terry Avenue, Boren Avenue, Minor Avenue, each from Pine Street to Howell Street, and Howard Avenue, from Melrose Avenue to Howell Street, all in The City of Seattle, by constructing a plank roadway thereon twenty (20) feet in width, together with the necessary curbs and gutters, wood walks and by providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 24681, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, declaring the same to be a first lien thereon, and providing for the collection of said assessment.
